content: How many touchdowns would an American football team need to score to reach more than 30 points in a single game?

chosen: An American football team would need to score at least 6 touchdowns to reach more than 30 points in a single game, as the average number of points scored per touchdown is 6.
rejected: An American football team would need to score at least 6 touchdowns to reach more than 30 points in a single game, as the average number of points scored per touchdown is 6. This assumes that each touchdown is worth 6 points and there are no extra points or field goals scored.
snapchosen: An American football team would need to score at least 6 touchdowns to reach more than 30 points in a single game, as the average number of points scored per touchdown is 6.
